recipe.title: Spiced Pumpkin Seed and Cashew Crunch
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon garam masala or curry powder
instructions: Preheat oven to 300°F. Coat a rimmed baking sheet with nonstick spray. Whisk egg white, agave, garam masala, salt, and cayenne in a medium bowl. Add nuts and seeds and toss to coat. Using a slotted spoon, transfer mixture to baking sheet, letting excess egg drip back into bowl. Bake, tossing once, until mixture is golden brown, 20–25 minutes. Let cool on baking sheet.
DO AHEAD: Crunch can be made 5 days ahead. Store airtight at room temperature.
